scripts.compile:server: psc-bundle output/**/{index,foreign}.js --main Main --module Main | java -jar compiler.jar --js_output_file server.js
scripts.compile:client: psc-bundle output/**/{index,foreign}.js --main Client --module Client | browserify -e - | java -jar compiler.jar --js_output_file static/client.js
scripts.dev:client: psc-bundle output/**/{index,foreign}.js --main Client --module Client | browserify -e - -o static/client.js
scripts.start: npm run compile:server & npm run compile:client && node server.js
scripts.dev: npm run dev:server     & npm run dev:client     && node server.js
scripts.watch:client: watch  'npm run test && npm run dev:client' src/ --ignoreDotFiles
